entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
